# wxapp-微信小程序组件
weui-wxss中的样式还算齐全（<a href="https://github.com/weui/weui-wxss" target='_blank'>https://github.com/weui/weui-wxss</a>），不过根据自己平时的业务需要又新增了一些组件，目前想到的暂时为以下几个

 1.  <img src="data:image/png;base64,"> 文字跑马灯
 2. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">   弹出层（全屏，下半屏）（常用于选择商品属性）
 3.  <img src="data:image/png;base64,">  订单好中差评价交互
 4. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">  富文本解析(项目地址：<a href="https://github.com/icindy/wxParse" target="_blank">https://github.com/icindy/wxParse</a>)
 5.  <img src="data:image/png;base64,"> alert提示（错误，警告，成功，加载，icon可选，文字可配置）
 6. <img src="data:image/png;base64,"> loading
 7. <img src="data:image/png;base64,"> 横向滚动图文
 8. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">左侧可滑动tab
 9. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">横向可滑动tabbar
 9. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">左滑取消操作[可选]、删除
 10.  <img src="data:image/png;base64,">单选按钮，复选按钮，on/off开关；checkbox全选/全不选
 11. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">视频自动横屏播放
 12. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">省市区三级联动（单页面（小程序的页面层级限制）、多页面两种）
 13. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">瀑布流图文（商品列表，宽度固定，高度自适应）
 14. <img src="data:image/png;base64,">3D图片轮换
